name: @connected-web/openapi-rest-api
description: An AWS-CDK library for building very cheap and extremely scalable OpenAPI documented APIs using AWS API Gateway, and AWS Lambda.

scripts.lint: npm -w library run lint && npm -w examples run lint
scripts.lint:fix: npm -w library run lint:fix && npm -w examples run lint:fix
scripts.test: npm -w library run test && npm -w examples run test

author: Connected Web
